statement.p: Aminata is conducting market research on the cost of a cell phone data plan. Aminata has determined that the average annual cost of a cell phone data plan is 996, and that the distribution of costs is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 95.
a. Find the probability that a single randomly selected consumer spends more than 1048 on a cell phone data plan.
b. The cost of the middle 30 of cell phone data plans falls between (round to the nearest dollar):
c. The most expensive 15 of cell phone data plans cost at least how much annually?
